name: The Zone of Interest
description: The commandant of Auschwitz, Rudolf Höss, and his wife Hedwig, strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden next to the camp.

review.author: dennisgreen-51507
review.heading: Masterwork
review.reviewBody:
This film is Masterwork one of the greatest films of the last few years. However, since it does not have... it can not win any awards. This is the case because awards now mandate... be enforced on all films. I am surprised it got funding to be made considering that it... A lot of excellent scripts go unfunded and are not made because they are not... enough.

Too bad if you come up with an idea for a Masterwork but if you do not have enough... it will never be made.

In this day and age even certain topics are forbidden but they are important to learn from the evil of the past so you do not repeat it when fighting that evil today. Ironic isn't it?
